error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\default_content\Functional\DefaultContentTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\default_content\Functional\DefaultContentTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\field\Tests\EntityReference\EntityReferenceTestTrait in class Drupal\Tests\default_content\Kernel\ExporterIntegrationTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.2 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Tests\field\Traits\EntityReferenceTestTrait instead.

Call to deprecated method setExpectedException() of class Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Backward compatibility for PHPUnit 4 will no longer be supported.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to default_content.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
